HUD: {:CMT:(Slack) start, join, leave or end a HUDDle (⌘⇧H)}{:KEY_COMBO:SUPER_L(SHIFT_L(H))}
PR*EPL: {:CMT:(Discord, Slack) jump to PREvious unread channel or direct Message (⌥⇧↑)}{:KEY_COMBO:ALT_L(SHIFT_L(UP))}
TPH*EPL: {:CMT:(Discord, Slack) jump to NExt unread channel or direct Message (⌥⇧↓)}{:KEY_COMBO:ALT_L(SHIFT_L(DOWN))}
TPHR-D: {:CMT:(Discord, Slack) open the all uNReaD view (⌘⇧A)}{:KEY_COMBO:SUPER_L(SHIFT_L(A))}
TPHRAED: {:CMT:(Slack) JuMp to the most recent unread message in a conversation (⌘J)}{:KEY_COMBO:SUPER_L(J)}
